title: UK tariffs
description: Use this service to check the UK Global Tariff that will apply to goods you import from 1 January 2021. You can also check the difference between what you pay now and what you’ll pay from 1 January 2021.
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll to how to check the tariff and click on the link 'You can download the full UKGT (csv: 2.5mb)'.
sizingNotes: 1 CSV, stage 1 trasnsform required however discussion will be required to determine dimensions etc. as this is not a statisical dataset.
notes:
Guidance to using the tool can be found here:
https://www.gov.uk/guidance/using-the-trade-tariff-tool-to-find-a-commodity-code
